eu.cqse.check.framework.scanner

Interface ILenientScanner

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IScanner

    public interface ILenientScanner
extends IScanner
    Lenient scanner that, in contrast to IScanner, does not throw ScannerExceptions for unrecognized characters, but returns tokens of token class ETokenType.ETokenClass.ERROR and resumes scanning.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IToken getNextToken()
      Returns the next token.

      • Methods inherited from interface eu.cqse.check.framework.scanner.IScanner

        close, reset

             throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the next token.
        Specified by:
        getNextToken in interface IScanner
        Returns:
        the next token. Returns ETokenType.EOF when current file is entirely scanned.
